name: Honda Battle of the Bands
description: The Honda Battle of the Bands is one of the premier HBCU band showcases, featuring the nation's top eight HBCU marching bands selected through an annual invitation process.

name: National Battle of the Bands
description: The National Battle of the Bands brings together HBCU bands for an exciting showcase of talent and tradition.

name: Band of the Year
description: Band of the Year is a competitive event recognizing excellence in HBCU band performance.

name: Mayhem in the Mecca
description: Mayhem in the Mecca showcases all-star bands in an electrifying event.

name: Midsouth Massacre
description: The Midsouth Massacre features intense all-star band performances in the Mid-South region.

name: Gulf Coast Takeover
description: Gulf Coast Takeover brings all-star band energy to the Gulf Coast.

name: Battle for the Culture
description: Battle for the Culture celebrates HBCU band culture through all-star performances.

name: Battle of the Gulf Coast
description: Battle of the Gulf Coast features competitive all-star band performances.

name: Columbus Battle Of The Bands
description: Columbus Battle of the Bands showcases HBCU band talent in Columbus.

name: Richmond Co BOTB
aliases: Richmond County Battle of the Bands
Richmond Co Battle of the Bands
description: Richmond County Battle of the Bands features competitive band performances.

name: MEAC SWAC Challenge
description: The MEAC/SWAC Challenge brings together teams and bands from two historic HBCU conferences.

name: Bayou Classic
description: The Bayou Classic is the annual rivalry between Grambling State and Southern University, featuring one of the most anticipated halftime shows of the year.

name: Florida Classic
description: The Florida Classic is the annual rivalry game between Florida A&M and Bethune-Cookman, known for spectacular band performances.

name: Southern Heritage Classic
description: The Southern Heritage Classic is an annual football game and band showcase held in Memphis, Tennessee.

name: State Fair Classic
description: The State Fair Classic features the annual rivalry game and halftime battle.

name: Turkey Day Classic
description: The Turkey Day Classic is a Thanksgiving tradition featuring HBCU football and marching bands.

name: Atlanta Football Classic
description: The Atlanta Football Classic brings HBCU football and band culture to Atlanta.

name: Red River Classic
description: The Red River Classic showcases HBCU bands and football along the Red River region.

name: Crown Classic
description: The Crown Classic features HBCU bands competing for supremacy.

name: Comparative Study
description: Comparative Study events analyze and celebrate HBCU band performances.

name: Port City Classic
description: The Port City Classic brings HBCU band tradition to the coast.

name: Gulfcoast Challenge
description: The Gulfcoast Challenge brings competitive spirit to Gulf Coast bands.

name: Soul Bowl
description: The Soul Bowl Classic celebrates HBCU football and band culture.

name: Black College Football Hall of Fame Classic
aliases: Black College Football Hall of Fame
description: The Black College Football Hall of Fame Classic honors HBCU football and band excellence.
